exercises.name: Plank Low Row
exercises.description: Start in a plank position with dumbbells. Row one arm up while keeping hips square to the ground. Maintain core tightness.

exercises.name: Scapular Pushups
exercises.description: In pushup position, keep elbows locked. Drop chest towards floor by squeezing shoulder blades together, then push back up by separating them.

exercises.name: SPT Hold (Alignment)
exercises.description: Draw your bow (or stretch band) to holding position. Maintain perfect T-alignment. Focus on expanding through the clicker zone without collapsing.
